item.title: Maximize Cost Savings with Azure Hybrid Benefit for Windows Server, SQL Server, and Linux Subscriptions
item.description: Azure Hybrid Benefit is a powerful cost-saving offering from Microsoft that allows you to optimize your hybrid environment by leveraging your existing Windows Server, SQL Server licenses, and Linux subscriptions. By taking advantage of this benefit, you can save up to 85% over the standard pay-as-you-go rate when running your workloads on Azure. One of the key features of Azure Hybrid Benefit is its flexibility. You can use it in the Azure SQL platform as a service (PaaS) environment, allowing you to seamlessly migrate and modernize your SQL Server databases to the cloud.
